title: DOGE takes over federal grants website, wresting control of billions
summary: Elon Musk’s operatives have taken over grants.gov, the main portal for federal grant applications, removing agency access and rerouting approvals through an unauthorized DOGE-monitored system–affecting over $500 billion in annual awards
